sentence.Network_en: His resoluteness carried him through the battle.

means.word_mean: 1. the trait of being resolute; firmness of purpose;

sentences.sentence: "his resoluteness carried him through the battle"
"it was his unshakeable resolution to finish the work"

auth_sentence.content: But on many issues his generally admirable resoluteness has descended into pig-headed obstinacy.

auth_sentence.content: Many see the hallmarks of Judy, his mother, in Murray's resoluteness.
